page.title: 03A Child's Day in Creeting
page.content: I am a girl of seven years old and live on a fruit and vegetable farm. I wake up at 7 o'clock, brush my hair, go downstairs and have breakfast. I usually have cornflakes or cocopops. Afterwards I brush my teeth and go to school by car. When I get there I play in the play- ground until the bell goes. Then we do writing and Maths. Maths is measuring and adding and taking away. Lunchtime is at 12 o'clock. We sometimes have potatoes and meat and vegetables. We play games after lunch and then do more work, like Topic and Craft. When it is time to go home we play on the farm and then we go to get my sister from playgroup. Later on we have tea,brush our teeth and have a story. At bedtime I read, then count sheep before I sleep.
